articles.title: Sandra Bullock’s partner Bryan Randall dies aged 57 - The Guardian
articles.description: The photographer, who Bullock described as ‘the love of my life’, died after a three-year battle with ALS, the most common form of motor neurone disease
articles.content:
Bryan Randall, the longtime partner of Sandra Bullock, has died aged 57 from ALS (amyotrophic lateral sclerosis), it has been announced.
